floorPlan.name: Room

roomA.name: 「Yeo Yu」
descriptions: soft, pure cotton bedding and daily hanbok.
bedroom equipped with pure cotton bedding for sound sleep.
Home appliances for simple cooking, Balmuda toaster and nespresso coffee machine provided.
Bathroom equipped with MoltonBrown toiletries, overlooking front yard.
Private backyard to gaze upon the stars and rest under the eaves.

floorPlan.serviceDescription: Gift to those who need sound rest.. Traditional Korean stay YeoYeo

owner: Owner Kim Myoungsug | Manager Park Jeongwoong
address: 53, Gaenmaeul-gil, Gyeongju-si, Gyeongsangbuk-do, Republic of Korea

service.name: Services
projector: Movies at the end of the day

poem:
Under the pine forest of Mt. Namsan in Gyeongju,
A special gift for you who needs a complete rest.
